verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wonderful Lord so full of grace, So full of mercy
Mighty you are, with power to save, Power to heal
And I will worship you, I give my life to you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are faithful to me and will never cease to be
All your promises will come to pass in your power and sovereignty
You are faithful and true perfect timing in all you do
So I'll never stop trusting you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are God and you are good, so good to me
Great is Your love, you lift up my head
When darkness surrounds me
Tender You are, holding me close,
You never let go
